      • configure

        public void configure(Project project,
                      SourceSet set,
                      Action<? super Javadoc> configure)
        Description copied from interface: LanguageSupport.TaskHandler
        Configure the task for the specified SourceSet. The dependent plugin for the task may not yet be applied, so the configuration should be guaranteed to be applied after the plugin is applied.
        Specified by:
        configure in interface LanguageSupport.TaskHandler<Javadoc>
        Parameters:
        project - Project that is being built out
        set - SourceSet to configure the task for
        configure - Action indicating the configuration to perform on the task

      • register

        public void register(Project project,
                     SourceSet set,
                     JavaVersion version)
        Description copied from interface: LanguageSupport.DocumentationHandler
        Register the documentation task(s) for the specified SourceSet. The dependent plugin for the task may not yet be applied, so the configuration should be guaranteed to be applied after the plugin is applied.
        Specified by:
        register in interface LanguageSupport.DocumentationHandler<Javadoc>
        Parameters:
        project - Project that is being built out
        set - SourceSet to register the documentation task for
        version - JavaVersion that the task is targeting
